ssot__EmailPublication__dlm.name: Email Publication
ssot__EmailPublication__dlm.description: The Email Publication DMO represents a publication, such as a campaign or an orchestration, used in the email channel.

ssot__BodyTxt__c.description: The text representation of an Email message.

ssot__ClickThroughPct__c.description: The percentage of emails sent which contained a tracked URL that was clicked by the recipient.

ssot__ClickToOpenPct__c.description: The quantity of emails where the tracked URL was clicked, compared with the quantity that were opened, expressed as a percentage.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date and time record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by External Record Id.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where the record came from, whether that is the name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__DeliveryPct__c.description: The percentage of emails sent based on this template that were successfully delivered.

ssot__Description__c.description: Detailed description of an in-person appointment.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for Email Publication Id.

ssot__EnagementAssetId__c.description: A reference ID to the engagement asset.

ssot__EnagementAssetContentId__c.description: A reference ID to the engagement asset content.

ssot__EngagementChannelTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to the type of engagement channel.

ssot__EngagementTopicGroupId__c.description: A reference ID for the master list of topics that Engagements can be about.

ssot__ErrorMessageTxt__c.description: The text of the error message

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the External Record ID was assigned.

ssot__FromAddr__c.description: Email address from which the emails are sent

ssot__FromName__c.description: The name of the person the email is from.

ssot__HasAttachment__c.description: True if an attachment is included in this email.

ssot__HTMLBodyTxt__c.description: The HTML rendering of the email body.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to a business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: Date and time when the user last modified the record.

ssot__Name__c.description: The name of the Email publication.

ssot__OpenPct__c.description: The number of emails opened compared to the number of emails sent, expressed as a percentage.

ssot__OptOutPct__c.description: The quantity of emails that resulted in unsubscription, compared to the total number sent, expressed as a percentage.

ssot__ParentEngagementPublicationId__c.description: A reference ID for another publication. This relationship enables engagement publication hierarchies.

ssot__ReplyToAddr__c.description: The reply-to address set on the generated emails.

ssot__ScheduledDt__c.description: The scheduled date and time to send the email to recipients.

ssot__SendClassificationId__c.description: A reference ID that determines how consent is checked. Enum values: Transactional (for example, placing an order implies opt-in for an order confirmation email), Commercial (promotional email requiring opt-in)

ssot__SendMechanismName__c.description: The mechanism used to send this email.

ssot__TotalDeliveredQty__c.description: The number of times emails based on this template have been successfully delivered.

ssot__TotalHardBounceQty__c.description: The number of times emails based on this template have hard bounced due to invalid email addresses.

ssot__TotalOpensQty__c.description: The number of times emails based on this template have been opened.

ssot__TotalSoftBounceQty__c.description: The number of times emails based on this template have soft bounced (returned by server).

ssot__TotalSpamComplaintsQty__c.description: The number of emails that were reported as spam.

ssot__TotalTrackedLinkClicksQty__c.description: The number of tracked URLs in emails that were opened.

ssot__UniqueClickThroughPct__c.description: The percentage of emails sent which contained a tracked URL that was clicked by unique recipients.

ssot__UniqueOpensQty__c.description: The number of emails that were opened by unique recipients.

ssot__UniqueOptOutsQty__c.description: The total number of emails that resulted in recipients unsubscribing.

ssot__UniqueTrackedLinkClicksQty__c.description: The number of tracked URLs in emails that were opened by unique recipients.
